answerText: Eliza Sommers [accept either][10] Eliza Sommers is the title character of Daughter of Fortune, a novel by this author of Eva Luna.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 3 | 6 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character joins Joe Bonecrusher's traveling band of prostitutes and serves as their chef after she miscarries during a voyage with Tao Chi'en. [10] Name this character who searches for her lost love, Joaquin Andieta. This character's granddaughter, Aurora del Valle, is the protagonist of Portrait in Sepia.
